Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @SHossain ok, i see 13% of the network not notarizing a 3rd party coin, and that doesn't seem great

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: since DNS seeds can only return a max of 11 IP's in a DNS packet, this gives a good chance of all DNS seeds being useless for a given coin

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: (11/64)*(1 - 13%) = 11/64*(.87) = .149 = 15% chance all DNS seeds returned are not valid
